name: Alliance4Europe gGmbH
memberOrga: Alliance4Europe is not a membership organisation
goal: A non-profit coordination hub for pro-democratic and pro-European actors, seeking to protect and promote democracy and fundamental values, including human rights, and the rule of law, through citizen engagement across Europe.
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives:
Issues concerning civil society space, European democracy, citizenship, digital citizenship, media literacy and action to counter disinformation and hate-speech.

These may include: the creation of a European Values Instrument, the future of the European Instrument for Human Rights and Democracy, the activity of Strategic Communications Task Forces in European Neighbourhood.
